name: Sniper 3D - zombie killer(zombie hunter), free zombie shooting games
name_original: Sniper 3D - zombie killer(zombie hunter), free zombie shooting games
description:
Sniper 3D HD is a fun sniper games and zombie survival games , you need kill all zombies to reach target score in limited time or protect the survivor.

Game feature:
- 10 different type of zombies;
- 2 different mission scene;
- easy tap&tilt control;
